overview:
Deborah is co-founder of Soya Marketing (aka Sit on Your Ass Marketing).

She has applied her social media wizardry to create a Facebook strategy for Opus Hotel Group, to launch a hot Montreal restaurant and to manage sticky issues for companies dealing with controversy. She has guest lectured at Simon Fraser University and the British Columbia Institute of Technology.

Deborahâ€™s marketing background includes more than a decade at some of Canadaâ€™s leading agencies including National PR and RMG Connect. Sheâ€™s worked on big-name accounts such as Molson, Telus, Vancouver General Hospital and VanCity. She was also a marketing Director for Biolytical Laboratories, a BC-based company that produces a rapid HIV test.
